error.token_expired: OAuth Token has expired, please issue a new one

token.title: Provide user OAuth Token
token.description:
Since Aigües de Barcelona uses Recaptcha, you'll need to provide the Token manually.
Please paste the token string here (starts with ey....)

reauth_confirm.title: Relogin - Provide user OAuth Token

Since Aigües de Barcelona uses Recaptcha, you'll need to provide the Token manually.
Please paste the token string here (starts with ey....)
